quote: What does freedom really mean, when demanded of you by a god
author: GI

quote: Cling no longer to past grievances but hold tight to memory this act of benevolence
author: GI

quote: Privacy is not luxury a necessity
author: EDNA

quote: Better no-one remember me as we who sold the world, for good or worst
author: NA

quote: Piracy is almost always a service problem and not a pricing problem
author: Gabe Newell

quote: Theory and practice sometimes clash. And when that happens, theory loses. Every single time.
author: Linus Torvalds

quote: No great mind ever existed without a touch of madness
author: Aristotle

quote: Only religious fanatics and totalitarian states equate morality with legality.
author: Linus Torvalds

quote: I like offending people, because I think people who get offended should be offended.
author: Linus Torvalds

quote: There should be no obstacles to accessing knowledge.
author: Alexandra Elbakyan

quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
author: John Lennon

quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill
